content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in our swimming pool and saw what appeared to be a very faint satelite, a starlike object moving at a steady speed from ne to se direction at about 10 oclock from out position, looking to the ne. in the middle of the sky a bright becon of light appered to shine with a prtty good sized glow around the object.  the beacon appeared to be pretty bright and flased from side to side for a few moments with the glow or aura around it getting brighter.  it almost looked like it might be falling to earth. after about 30 seconds the light dimed and the starlike object continued moving in a southern direction in the eastern sky.  the sighting took place at 8:45 pm we were looking up at the sky and observed what we thought was a satelite.  it was obviously very high in the sky and generally planed have blinking lights, this did not.  i was so bright were pretty sure someone else must have seen this and maybe reported it. the object continues at a very slow and steady speed intil it was out of sight toward the horizon.
content.summary: My wife and i observed a starlike object that appered to be a satelite, flash a bright becon with an aura then continue in the same path.

content.detailedDescription: Two silver discs flying along close to the ground....(we could view it from our van out the driver's side...While driving towards okc)...(going east)...Husband saw it first and we watched it quickly change direction and went straight up quickly....Could no longer see it...As it went from view very fast...But husband stuck his head out the window to look up...And saw a vapor trail that was being left behind as the two spheres ascended into the sky....(it was yellowish in color)  (we had been down to the texas state line to visit family...And it was mother's day...And we were returning home in the wee hours of the morning....And that was a sunday...We were shocked to see something so strange and foreign to us....I wondered if it was some kind of new ammunition (hah) being tested....As they were round, shiny, and like giant dishes...Flying parallel to the ground...Then they suddenly rose and flew as if towards 2 o'clock..(to illustrate using a clock...As i do not know degrees)..Lost sight of the objects as we were driving down the highway and it was necessary to stop looking (for my husband) in order to maintain control of the van...It looked to be flying from a westerly direction...Over open fields which had small trees on them....And maybe livestock...And then it ascended as it got into a populated (housing) addition...It was in the edge of a town, but out in the country.They looked to be at least a quarter of a mile from where we were driving...But we were the only ones on the highway at the time, since it was early morning...And we had come from a virtually unpopulated area....Brushy terrain, no homes...Wide open spaces..
content.summary: *two silver discs flying low to the ground

content.detailedDescription:
Was staying up late saturday night at a west canyon diablo ranch home. sitting around with a friend talking we noticed what looked like an reddish/orange colored twinkling star very close to the horizon. we stood up for a clearer view and we notice this was no star. it was too close to the horizon to be a bright clear star. 
pulled out my binaculars and saw it was over the rural area of the bird springs community (navajo rez). i could make out the distance ancient volcanic geo-formations in the background. 
we looked at this glowing light for about 2 mins and then it disappeared only to re-appear immediately (.5 sec, like on and off)to the left of where it was (keep in mind we were looking from a distance of 30 miles away). the distance between the 1st sighting and the 2nd sighting was considerable, about 2 fingers together, arms length in front of me. maybe 1 to 1.5 miles apart. 
this one glowed/twinkled for 30 secs or so and then disappeared.
content.summary: Star like object glowing in sky over birdsprings

content.detailedDescription:
July 29 2011, myself and two others were observing the night sky from our backyard in surrey british columbia, 30 km south west of vancouver in hopes of viewing delta aquarid meteor shower.  between midnight and 1am after having seen several relatively faint meteors and a handful of satellites we noticed an object similar in size and brightness to that of a 'medium' bright star traveling roughly twice the speed of a satellite stop dead for several seconds, then accelerate zig zag and large sweeping high speed maneuvers.  from the time we noticed it to when it became invisible behind the houses/ horizon roughly 15-30 seconds had passed.  we continued to star/ ufo gaze and approximately 10 minutes later noticed another object identical to the first flying across the sky, stopping, starting, turning and performing otherwise seemingly impossible maneuvers.  it then appeared to 
'split' into two.  the second sighting was within our field of vision for about 10-15 seconds before disappearing among the light wash of the city/horizon.  no sound whatsoever was detected while the objects were overhead. the speed at which they traveled was maybe 12 inches held at arm's length for every second. needless to say we were completely astonished and also excited for having witnessed something that remarkable.
content.summary: Anomalous starlike objects accelerating, slowing, stopping turns etc. in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of the sunset.. my son and i saw this object in the sky. it was bright but very small, i'm thinking its a jet plane... i took a picture then looked at my camera,i started to take another picture of it but it was gone. it was in the middle of the sky.. it would have had to travel very fast to leave the whole sky. still thinking it was a plane i brought up the picture i had just taken and zoomed up on the it. it does not look like a plane. i just wanted someone to tell me what it is.  i do not belive in ufo's (not till i see one) maybe i have one now.  i will send you the picture and let you zoom in on it. it was the last picture i took. i could send you some leading up to that one. i couldn't see anything in any other picture. please let me know what is asap.
thanks for your time.
content.summary: Silver, maybe lights could be reflection of sun, very small like jet plane.

content.detailedDescription: My family & i were driving west bound on interstate 90, west of gary, indiana at approx. 8:30 pm on a clear night, when my cousin pointed out a light in the sky that appeared to be a comet heading towards the earth.  as we observed the light it appeared to have a tail like a comet when all of the sudden the light split into 3 white orbs continuing in the same direction.  next, the 3 orbs split into 6 orbs and formed a circle for what seemed like a few seconds.  all the time we were still driving when the 6 orbs changed shape and formed a what appeared to be a 3 dimentional cube shape.  within a few seconds of that the lights disappeared and were no longer seen as we continued on the interstate.  my cousin was able to capture one of the lights on her cell phone although the picture was not a clear picture as we were still moving on the interstate.   my cousin & husband looked on their smart phones for any reports of what we witnessed to no avail.  today i decided to look on line to see if anyone else had reported an incident on this day.  i believe there was only one report in the general area. we were baffled and in disbelief over the lights and what we had witnessed.
content.summary: Appeared as a comet at first

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 9 p.M in the metroparks off 252 columbia road, north olmstead ohio. my boyfriend and i were about to enter the forest path when he pointed to a bright object in the sky asking what is was. it appeared a reddish orange and kind of star shaped fireball, it just hovered in one spot in the sky and we could see it moving very slightly from right to left. it lasted only a few moments and the light dimmed and it seemed to just fade out of existence. 

it was hard to tell how high it was but to me it didn't look very high at all as the sky seemed further away then it was. there was no sound and it was somewhere off above the trees. i thought it was really cool to see, as we're both very into the paranormal.

this area is right by an airport btw but the planes that come in around there are extremely close up as they come in for landing and departing. the object we saw wasn't flying and as i said moved in a left to right motion back and forth for a moment before it faded away. moments later another plane flew by. im thinking it could have vanished so not to be seen by the plane?

i've looked this up and have seen a lot of these 'fireball' ufo's reported recently and thought reporting it might be helpful to your research on what these could possibly be. 

feel free to send me an e-mail if you have any comments or ideas about this.
content.summary: Hovering fireball like ufo sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
On either oct. 15 or nov. 15 2010 sometime between 1:00-2:15 am.. both my son and myself observed a shadow cast upon broken clouds. this shadow appeared to be about 25'-50' in width from the ground. stretching horizon to horizon,from nne-ssw. when i first saw it was not moving , but after pointing out the phenomena to my son it started moving rapidly in south by south-easterly direction. there were also contrails in the area all of which seemed to be stationary. the clouds were moving mostly in an easterly direction, with a ceiling above thirty-five thousand feet. while watching the shadow there was a brake in the clouds where the moon was visible, but there was no sign of what was causing the shadow.The next day i called n.O.A.A. to find out if any one else had seen it, or weather or not they knew what was. they told me that it was a contrail.
being that i spent 10yrs. in the air force, along being an avid sky watcher i knew better. contrails don't move any thing like that this thing did.
content.summary: A bar like shadow reaching from horizon to horizon from n-ne to s-s w traviling in a s-se  direction at a rapid rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on deck watching planes take off from triad airport on a nice, cool saturday evening. commercial planes were leaving contrail, these 2 large dull,gray objects appeared leaving no contrail in front of commercial planes out of nowhere and my friend and i watched them travel faster than the planes for around two minutes..The first object left our sight quickly but the other gray object was flying in front of the commercial aircraft. the objects had a large tail fin but no wings, made no noise and flew faster than the commercial aircrafts, my friend said did you see that? it gave us chills... im military and know aircraft, and i have never seen nothing as fast and quiet as that! the commercial pilots had to see this too close up! this made me buy a strong zoom camcorder!!
content.summary: Two large fast gray objects with large tail fins

content.detailedDescription: at about 2045 hrs from  a local restaurant with see view as i was waiting for my food  i was filming the lighting and the storm in the ocean coming far south of puerto vallarta    when  i saw two  paths of light "not like" a lighting with 2 seconds apart each crossing the sky producing a hum noise from north to south in a ascending direction about 5 miles away the beach in puerto vallarta.
content.summary: Two paths of light with 2 seconds producing a hum noise  apart were seen in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed by two people in monbulk victoria 6.20p.M 31/7/2011. two star like objects travelling westward from the south/east . turn south in straight pattern and fly off in perfect alignment to each other . no noise ,photos,video taken directly after sighting revealed some objects that were not visible to naked eye . if you zoom in on the pictures you can observe two orbs . not sure if these were the ufos seen as they had gone from eyesight this was taken 30 seconds after.
content.summary: Monbulk sighting 31.7.2011

content.detailedDescription:
One night at the beginning of march 2011 while i was at work at the local grocery store, i walked out to my car for my break. it was approximately 7:00pm est. by 7pm in early march in michigan, it is usually very dark already. as i walked to my car, i suddenly felt compelled to look up. when i looked up i saw a white starlike object appear. it didn't just appear all of a sudden; it seemed as if it was already flying fast then it slowed down to a halt and "turned on" sort of starlike aura around it. in other words, when i first saw it, it looked like it "jumped out of hyperspace". it floated slowly forward for several seconds then seemed to "take off". as it "took off", the starlike aura disappeared and it was gone. it flew low compared to most planes, but it was still high enough where i couldn't see any details of it other than a starlike appearance. the whole thing didn't last more than 5 seconds. it seemed to me that under the starlike aura there was some sort of craft, but it can turn off and on the aura which makes it look vaguely like a shooting star. i know it wasn't a shooting star though cause as the starlike appearance disappeared, i vaguely remember seeing the silhouette of the body of some sort of craft flying off very quickly. it was as if it turned off the starlike aura in order to fly off stealthily. from what i could tell, it wasn't huge, but it was maybe about the size of a large fighter jet. after i saw it, i wasn't sure how to feel. my first instinct was to be afraid, but as my adrenaline kicked in i began to tell myself "wow, that was really amazing!". i kept quiet about the sighting for several days, then i shared my experience with close friends. i was never one to believe in ufo's, but after seeing this, i know don't find people who talk about them to be crazy like i used to.

about two more times i have seen things in the sky similar to this sighting. i only see this when i am in the davison area where i first saw it. the second time i saw it, i was driving home from a movie with a friend in the car, and we both saw the same thing happen just over the treeline on the road. i cannot recall in detail the other time i saw it, but i definitely know i saw it at least one more time after my second sighting. i know that i am not crazy, because my friend was able to recount to me exactly the same thing i saw when i questioned him about what we saw in the car.

all three times, the sightings happened exactly the same. all three times, it happened in the area of davison, mi. i even have a friend who was there for one of the sightings and saw exactly what i did.

i don't know what it was, but it was definitely not something you see every day. whatever/whoever was the cause of this strange thing i saw; all i can tell you is that it happened, and i saw it.
content.summary: Shooting star ufo

content.detailedDescription: Im sorry,i don���t know if not going into complete detail would have any repercussions. it���s just that the event that took place is so personal and still lingers among my friends and myself. i don���t mind going into to full disclosure if i���m talking to somebody over the phone. it just concerned me when i saw it was "viewable to the public". also the event happened in june of 1999. we made a pack, the three of us; to not say anything about what happened to prevent scrutiny from the public. i still want to preserve the privacy of my friends and myself. it���s just���i feel like it���s been a long enough time and i need to tell our story.
content.summary: Originally there was one light and then two shooting around defining physics. then later, one very large “something” came down about the size of a football field. we were camping on a isolated beach on an island 26 miles off the coast of california.

content.detailedDescription: Explain over the phone are in person.
content.summary: Talk over phone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking in my neighborhood, about 7:30 in the evening, but there was still plenty of daylight.  a flock of birds caught my attention, and in the distance behind the flock of birds i saw what i thought was an airplane.  

i watched it, not because it was doing anything interesting, but because it was in my line of sight.  i couldn't see any wings, and so continued to watch it, waiting to see if it was jet plane, or a propeller plane, whatever... just idle curiosity.  

so i watch this thing get closer to me, which remained completely silent by the way, and notice that there's no wings, no tail, no nothing.  it looked like a long white tylenol gelcap, complete with a black seam around the middle of it. i stop walking completely by this time, this thing has my full attention. it moved at a slight diagonal, passing in front of me, coming from my left to my right, moving from east-by-southeast to north-by-northwest, moving at a pretty good clip, not making any turns...Steady course, speed and altitude...And completely silent. it finally disappeared behind some trees.  somewhere within that 4-5 minutes while i was watching it, and the perspective changed as it moved, i should have seen wings or a tail, or a cockpit or windows, if it were, in fact, a plane. 

i saw the front of it as it was heading towards me, the side of it as it passed in front of me and the back end of it as it continued on. i would have been able to see wings or a tail from at least one of the perspectives. but there weren't any to see.

it was a solid white capsule with a black ring around the middle of it. a flying headache capsule! i realize i should have taken a picture with my cell phone, but i kept thinking it was a plane. by the time my brain kicked in, telling me, okay kiddo, this is no airplane, it was already over the trees to my west and it was too late. 

after thinking about it for a few days, and not being able to come up with any logical conclusion, i googled "capsule ufo" to see if maybe it was some new aircraft.  i found, on google images, the exact thing i saw. this is it, exactly.   http://lightsinthetexassky.Blogspot.Com/2010/07/navy-veteran-witnesses-cylinder-shaped.Html.
content.summary: Silent white capsule-like object over lawrenceville, ga

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:15pm i let the dog out and was star gazing on my back deck.  due north of my location a bright orange sphere which initialy seemed small caught my eye.  it was pulsating and suddenly grew very very large.  i ran back inside my house and grabbed my camera phone and nv.  i video recorded the object which seemed to hover mostly then moved north and west.  the object continued to pulsate.  suddenly the object drastically shrank in size. the whole event lasted a couple of minutes.

after playing the video back on the computer you can see at 27 seconds into the video a bright very very fast star like flash which apprears to be shot out from the sphere.   

i've spotted and recorded a few ufo's in the past and reported them here.  i dont know what this object was it just seemed so large.   clearly larger that a full moon looks in the sky.  i'm not sure at the distance from the object it seemed close but i could be certain.  if i had to guess less than a mile.
content.summary: Pulsing orange sphere changing size

content.detailedDescription:
i have seen many objects(u.F.O.)in the skies over n.D. in the past ten years. last one was was early this morning (midnight hour) 7/31/11 in the eastern sky. first noticed by my sister in the backseat about a mile away from our farm. stopping in the road to get a better look. noticing that it seemed to expell something from the bottom. another smaller sphere 2 or three times.  this was a very bright sphere in the low in the sky. pulsating bright white light , growing dim then black (dark) then super bright. sphere seemed to move in all directions back forth up and down. there were at least 2 planes that were flying past very close to the sphere. i commented to my sister "do you think they see it too?" thinking they are in the sky and have a way better close up look? 
i got back in our car and we drove up to our farm. while my husband was taking in our groceries. my sister and i were watching for about an hour. 


mostly just filling out this report to ask did anyone else see what we were seeing this morning?

 did not loose sight , just went inside. i've seen many unexplainable things in the n.D. skies at night.  last year(summer)i was looking out my back door , saw a small red sphere moving around a field in my back yard. no more than 150 yards away. all of my sightings are always at night. and in the summer/ but that red sphere was so close to my backyard and maybe six feet off the ground. the only sighting that ever spooked me good. this is the first time i have ever reported anything . just thinking people will not take it serious. i will start filming proof of what i have been seeing for the last ten years.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A very bright sphere in the sky low pulsating flashing

content.detailedDescription: I have a few stories to tell mufon from 1975 to 1977 i have 3 witnesses that saw the same thing i saw. it happen coming back from the beaches in delaware an two from when i ran the rode with my oldest brother mike. he is the one that showed me this object the first time i saw it. will have to explain the first time i seen it. and also about 7 bright orange balls in the sky out west.
content.summary: Like a star then light came out of light we were watching moved to the side then both took off out of sight

content.detailedDescription: No details of the object were known for about 2 weeks after the event. i did not see the object at the time it was photographed. i discovered it in the frame when i later viewed the photos.
content.summary: Unknown object

content.detailedDescription: 3 oclock am right after electrical storm we wre in lvingroom my husband i and the two kids. all awoken by the storm. our son was sitting in the chair looking out the door window and stated its a world war, we looked out the window and the most beautiful colors were eminating in the sky suddenly our palor fan which was on high slowed down as if we wre looking at it through a strob light and the lights dimmed we went to the door and looked out it was dark then no colors and singular lights appeared like spotlights on the ground coming from above not 5 seconds later these lights slowly started to move in an oval we could see the road and tree line way across the street of course the kids wanted to go out and look up but we wre too scared and said no these lights lasted about a min and stopped turning went they stopped turning the fan speeded up and the lights became bright again. and then it was gone . the next day the paper stated that it was swamp gas. but the next two towns up seen the beautiful lights too it was in the middletown press and the new haven register papers. i was sorry we didnt go out now and we still talk about this ufo with each other to this day i forgot to say the  ill call them spot lights must have been at least 100 this was very scary to us  the papers said swamp gas but there was no way not with the rotating spot lights i know this is along time ago but  this incident has haunted us all these years and i wanted to tell someone that  wouldnt think we were crazy  this thing was huge i think it was taking the power from the lines sorry im not a good writer neena
content.summary: Beautiful colors in sky then hundreds of light beams in circular motion hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work , it was apromx 11:30pm.
i stopped my car because in front of me in the sky appears a bright redrange ball of light
it terrified me at first there was one , then behind it appeared two more of the same. the seemed to hover then go overhead and disappear. i was the only car on the road at the time , i was hoping there was someone else there to see what i was seeing. i went to call my husband when i started driving but my cell phone had died . i had no idea what it was it didn't seem to be an airplane i have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Fire like balls of light in dark sky , one then 2 more , hovered then disappear

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my wife was flying a kite at the roosevelt park in the field by the track with my kid after a hour or so a object appears in the sky that looked like it was spinning but the main thing i know was it was metallic i might try to capture it again the thing is i kind believed but did not until i seen it in the sky and screamed to my girl to look and she also seen it then i was look around for other people to call attention to it but no one was around i started even scream look at some people who was a little far away across the street from the park i wanted other people to see it! as i kept looking at it it shinned at me i'm not sure if it was the surface or what not it also then started moving slowly and then just disappeared in front of my eye! this is no shit hook me and people have taken pictures of the same exact kind i have seen they are round and metallic looking and at night they glow i thought i seen on high in the sky along time ago but i had to look straight up in the air to see it. but this was their! i started saying what the hell was that we just seen a ufo it was wierd i just got done arguing with people who said they where snatched by aliens, i even apologized. i was part believer but a skeptic on alien abductions i now say nothing against believes as i now fully believe

well let me stop here because this did not end their i seen a lady in the park who just walk up just a few after it disappeared in thin air! she said she did not see it but she has seen them allot and she said she believed me i told her to keep a look out i wished i had a camera so bad! anyways i said maybe it was bag but i know what not a bag i know what they look like and it was real plus bags don't reappear. so how did it disappear for about 35 mins i did not see the lady but the object reappeared in the air and i was like hollyshit its back screaming at my girl to look and i looked for the lady but she was just gone i did not see her so she could have seen it if she was some where else else in the parkhell we joked it was as if she disappeared but hell some one else besides me had to see it, it was reflective when the sun hit it or it was flashing at me one of the two. this time it start to glide a little quicker and approaching our area a little and then it disappeared in front of my eyes again a few minutes later. i have a feeling that thing is still around this are and i want to know more its frustrating i wish i knew this site when it first happened but i can tell you it was not from this world nothing made of metal and that large can disappeared! matter of fact i don't know anything shinny that can disappeared entirely!

i just needed to tell you guys so maby some one could use the info, i told my whole family the day i seen it they all knew i was 100% for real, especially how existed i was about it. you know i would have never thought i see something like that so it was like me finding a treasure but i have no way to prove it and now i'm like people there is some crazy shit going on this was in a city! thanks for reading and i'm sorry for those i did not keep a open mind to, because normally i do i just dont know why they would just choose one person out just to do test, i wonder if their from with in our own planet! that missile footage i think most people know about where the ship moves makes me think their are multiple and they don't get quite along with each other just an idea! 

thanks for letting me tell story finaly and i can release it! i don't care what anyone says i know what i seen i and i will take a polygraph to prove it so did my fiance!
content.summary: A circle silver type craft i have also seen the exact thing on tv!

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out airplane window and saw a flock of shadows pass right around engine area thought to myself wow those birds came to close to the engine.. but took a second and said to myself wait birds cant fly this high. next saw two round blurry but more sphere in shape fly by closer to window under wing of airplane it really got my attention, then one silver sphere with a red window flew right under the wing i saw it as clear as day i tracked it with my eyes and i know what i saw but could not think what it could have been so as i was leaving the plan just so know i wasent dreaming or something a asked the airline stuart what were those rounded sphere like objects maybe she would give me an answere because i know this would bug me for a long time not knowing what is was.. hope this could be of any use thanks for listening.
content.summary: Looking out airplane window on my way back from memphis

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing guitar with a friend in the place i rented on leon st in perry fl, he took off and i jumped in my car to head out and look for some friends. as i made a right off leon headed north toward julia drive i noticed a light in the sky. i stopped and got out of my car and began to look at the object. it was probably 2000/3000/up there ft in the sky and was moving very slowly toward the west. it was orange/yellowish in color and very bright. it would hover and then move a little. it looked kind of like a halogen light on the interstate, that size that far off. i jumped in my car blasted to julia drive and made a left and was headed west toward us 19/27 when i passed the creek and curve i stopped just before the hwy and got on top of my car and watched the object. i looked like is was above and following hwy 98 to the west real slow. all of a sudden it took off and went completely out of site in a straight line to west in like a 1001 1000 count. it did not loose altitude, it was a clear cool night and it was very fast. to this day i get goose bumps when i think about it. we dont have anything then or now that can move that fast. it made no sound. i would be willing to take a lie detector test. i have never seen anything like that again. there are other folks that have had encounters in this area. mr leonard and his wife and two friends were chased down the aucilla river by a ufo along the same time period they were in a boat. he's dead now but his wife and their friends are still alive.
give me a hollar i would love for you guys to make an animation for me based on location and all.

sorry no photos but it happenned!1
content.summary: Bright light in the sky that hovered and moved at incredable speed

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking out my trash and i saw 2 like fireballs come pass me really fast like about 500 ft away from me and the other one passed over my head and it dissapeared. i went and got my telescope and binoculars and went to my back yard. almost everyday i have seen starlike lights that all of sudden start moving from side to another and just disappear. this happens about 3-4 different times same night. its looks like a star moving. i always call my son and wife to see them. they see the lights but they say its a plain or my son says they are satellites. i dont have any pictures or video cause they are too small to capture.
content.summary: Starlike and fireballs

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a smoke at around 2am and saw a glowing object hovering over the devil's backbone in estes park. this happens almost every night with 3 different colors coming from craft, then you will see a stealth do a fly over the front range of northern colorado and the object is too far away for pictures and would like to have this object investigated and would be willing to show where we live and what it does just about every night around 12am to 3am, from our place we can see the object floating and then disappearing later in the night as if a landing party is sent out, i am not one to boast about aliens but there has to be something out there besides ourselves.
i will video in the future and would like to camp out there and watch it from that perspective.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Glowing lights every night over estes park since january of 2011

content.detailedDescription: At about age 12, living on a farm in north attleboro,mass.Returning back to the house after evening feeding of chickens, about 7p.M. large reddish rock like object appeared above the house, heading east at a 15 degree, angle moving downward, at tree top level, object banked right, very slowly, (maybe 5mph), a bright light beam appeared from a pond, and object slowed even more and disappeared into the beam, and beam went out.
content.summary: Redesh rock like object,

content.detailedDescription:
Saw those 3 white lights at 6 a.M. the one on the right was trowing little red balls ( about a dozen) in the field below. all this was for an hour and then soon as daylight started to break the light on the fartest right that was throwing those red balls started to come towards my house at about 20 to 25 miles per hour, very slow, i ran outside to see that and saw it moving toward me. i ran inside the house and got my camera and by that time it was beside my rooftop, it's bottom almost touched my roof.
toke a picture and the flash popped up.
i ran beside my wall and i saw the diamond shape and the colors.
as the light moved along towards the sunrise i took a second picture that i have saved. that picture was taken at 25 to 30 feet above ground and all you see is a little speck with 3 different lights like a picture of something 3 miles away.
content.summary: 3 bright lights as snow

content.detailedDescription: Summer time out side in front yard, direcly over head just hier than the tree line and house. around the object cloud like? center of cloud a sweral of colers? lights? no other cloudes that day at all! i do not know what it was or is? is it man made or not? but did not act like anything i know thats man made! it was there then it was gone? it was around noon or so when i saw it then i dont remember any thing after? the time seemed later after? i never belived in aliens before and still try to be skeptical even now but this i'v never been able to esplain?
content.summary: Hovered over head

content.detailedDescription: We saw a flat, elongated, dark greyish, rectangular (with curved corners), object with three lights on the underside, gliding silently in the air between mt. wilson and the mountains to the east of lone pine, california, usa (to the east of death valley, california). it was moving southbound, over us-395 (n. main st.) near the intersection with whitney portal rd. my friend and i were out of our car on whitney portal rd., looking at stars with a telescope.  while i was looking through the telescope, my friend spotted the object to the east (toward us-395 (main st)) about 200 feet from where we were on whitney portal rd.  it was dark, but our eyes had become accustomed to the darkness.  he said he saw it materialize out of thin air.  he was shocked and quietly but urgently told me to look.  i pulled away from the telescoope, and saw the object which looked solid, dark grey and with three barely glowing round lights on the bottom.  it was silently gliding southbound, not moving very quickly and appeared to be about 150-200 feet above the ground, and approximately 50-60 ft in length, 20-30 ft deep and about 10-15 ft thick (all estimates).  it actually had the shape of a large tuna can. though my friend says he saw it materialize, it appeared to be solid during the entire time i saw it.  it also appeared very very dim, and was probably only visible because of the dim glowing lights on the bottom. it slowly glided behind some trees, and when we went to the other side of the trees, it was no longer there. (this whole thing was an incredible experience for us and was originally posted at the nuforc.Org website a few days after we witnessed it.  we went back to lone pine the following night, and the following weekend, to see if we could see it again -- but we never saw it again.)
content.summary: Two of us saw an elongated, rectangular, grayish object with curved corners and three lights on the bottom gliding silently east of death valley, ca.
